mapper.select: select to_char(member_login, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as login, count(*) as cnt FROM MEMBER group by to_char(member_login, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by 1
SELECT to_char(member_register, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as register, count(*) as cnt FROM MEMBER group by to_char(member_register, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by 1
select to_char(nowdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as now, sum(price) as price from buy where nowdate is not null group by to_char(nowdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by 1
select to_char(nowdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as now, sum(price) as price from sale where nowdate is not null group by to_char(nowdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by 1
select ss.price as sum_price, pname_k from (select sum(price) as price, pid from sale group by pid order by 1 desc) ss, resell_product rp where ss.pid = rp.pid and rownum <= 5
select bb.price as sum_price, pname_k from (select sum(price) as price, pid from buy group by pid order by 1 desc) bb, resell_product rp where bb.pid = rp.pid and rownum <= 5
